Booking conditions

The offer will be valid only for the Bank’s credit card holders during the aforementioned period of the offer.
The discounted rate is applicable for bookings made between 17 March – 9 April 2025.
The offer is valid for stays between 17 March – 30 April 2025 only. Excluding, blackout period from 10 – 15 April 2025.
Rates are inclusive of taxes (as imposed by the government).
Rates are subject to change at any time prior to a confirmed booking.
Reservations to be made by visiting https://www.aitkenspencehotels.com/cc-offer-mar-2025 only.
Rooms are subject to availability for this offer and will be confirmed, on a first-come-first-serve basis.
For the Rainforest Ecolodge; rate is inclusive of combined transport from car park to the hotel and back for 5-7 pax per jeep (one way: 8.8 Km/45 mins). If the guest chooses to arrange their own transportation, full payment inclusive of transport will still apply.
Full payment must be made to secure the booking.
The payment made is non-refundable and non-transferable.
Offer is not applicable for extras consumed at the property.
The discount given is based on the rack rate as determined by the company and not on rates that may be published on other platforms.Offer applicable only for Sri Lankans and Sri Lanka resident visa holders.
Cardholder must be present for the duration of the booked stay period for the offer to be valid.
Cardholder is required to submit the credit card & NIC/passport upon arrival at the Hotel for verification purposes.
Offer will not be valid if referred to at the time of check-in or checkout.
Kindly note meals served will be on a la carte or buffet, based on the hotels occupancy and will be determined by the hotel management.
Name changes will not be accepted once the payment is made.
For cancellations, full payment is non-refundable.
Please note the offer is not applicable for :
Corporate outings and day outings
Gift vouchers
Pre-confirmed bookings
To be combined with other offers
Reservations made through any other platforms, online or offline
